siteMetadata.title: VideoTranslatorAI
siteMetadata.description: Video Translator provides a real time AI transcription, translation and dubbing. Transform your text, image, audio and video content with support for 120+ languages.
siteMetadata.keywords: video translation,video translator,caption maker,closed captioning software,open captioning software,add captions to video,video captions,subtitle maker,subtitles for video,embed subtitles in video,subtitles video,ai transcription,ai translation,ai dubbing,ai reader,

nodes.title: How Video Translation Can Help River Conservation
nodes.description: In the age of digital connectivity, leveraging video translation can play a pivotal role in raising awareness and mobilizing communities worldwide to protect and preserve our rivers.
nodes.coverAlt: How Video Translation Can Help River Conservation

nodes.title: VideoTranslatorAI and Global Humanistic University Collaborate to Revolutionize AI Education
nodes.description: Global Humanistic University and VideoTranslatorAI are partnering on AI education. Explore the objectives and delivery plan on this exciting partnership.
nodes.coverAlt: VideoTranslatorAI and Global Humanistic University Collaborate to Revolutionize AI Education

nodes.title: Exploring the Future of Translation At UON: AI And Its Transformative Impact
nodes.description: Discover the transformative power of AI in translation! Our CEO was invited to a guest lecture at the University of Newcastle!
nodes.coverAlt: Exploring the Future of Translation At UON: AI And Its Transformative Impact

nodes.title: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App
nodes.description: Discover our website and app, with native multilingual support and powerful transcription, translation, and voiceover capabilities in 120 languages.
nodes.coverAlt: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App

nodes.title: Inclusive and Effective: The Power of Local Information Champions in Emergency Services
nodes.description: Discover how local information champions empower CALD communities by facilitating translated emergency communications for effective crisis response.
nodes.coverAlt: Inclusive and Effective: The Power of Local Information Champions in Emergency Services

nodes.title: How VideoTranslatorAI Helps Multicultural Communities In Emergencies
nodes.description: VideoTranslatorAI helps multicultural communities by translating audio, video, and text emergency broadcasts into 120+ languages.
nodes.coverAlt: How VideoTranslatorAI Helps Multicultural Communities In Emergencies
